name: Orbs (Speedgame Hardmode 2021 version)
description:
This is as far as I can go with the jam version. Couldn't implement further gameplay material because I hit a few blockers with some issues. Got some of it fixed, some of it stumped me though. I plan to keep on working on this though so I can get a proper playable game as I intended.

Gamepad: Left and Right analog sticks to move and rotate camera.

Keyboard & Mouse: WASD to move, Mouse to rotate camera.
